Key Match Events: David Fry hit a two-run home run in the 10th inning
Jhonkensy Noel hit a two-run pinch-hit home run in the ninth inning
Post-Match Reflections: Cleveland’s unexpected season that included 92 wins and the AL Central title was on the brink
First-year Guardians manager Stephen Vogt praised the team's resilience
Yankees manager Aaron Boone acknowledged the tough loss and the team's determination
Miscellaneous Highlights: Progressive Field fans danced on their seats and in the aisles after Noel’s home run
This was the 30th postseason matchup between the Guardians and Yankees
